segments.text: Joanna , I will go to the outlet center . You wanna go with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw Emily yesterday evening . She was wearing a CD evening gown . She told me she bought it in the outlet center and she saved $ 120 !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 120 ? ! Then I should go and see what I can get ...
segments.speaker: S2
